title: Golf for winners
brief_description: What people will get out of this video: 1. An understanding of the golf swing they never had before. They will know why the swing plane is an Absolute and why it will produce a powerful and repeating golf swing. 2.Fundamentals that golfers need to adhere to in order to swing on the correct Swing Plane. 3.Good visual images necessary for developing a correct golf swing. 4.Knowledge that they can help themselves so they can be their own best teacher. Rated: G
